_comment: English translations for Kotlin Cheat Code

kotlin.description: Kotlin reference cheat sheet with usage, examples, and more.

main().title: main()
main().description: main() function is the entry point of all Kotlin programs

Print文.title: Print Statements
Print文.code:
println("Greetings, earthling!")
print("Take me to ")
print("your leader.")

/*
Print:
Greetings, earthling!
Take me to your leader.
*/

コメント.title: Comments
コメント.code:
// this is a single line comment

/*
this
note
for
many
*/

実行順序.title: Execution Order

型推論.title: Type Inference

文字列連結.title: String Concatenation
文字列連結.code:
var streetAddress = "123 Main St."
var cityState = "Brooklyn, NY"

println(streetAddress + " " + cityState)
// Print: 123 Main St. Brooklyn, NY

文字列テンプレート.title: String Templates

組み込みプロパティと関数.title: Built-in Properties and Functions

文字エスケープ.title: Character Escaping
文字エスケープ.code:
print("\"Excellent!\" I cried. \"Elementary,\" said he.")

// Print: "Excellent!" I cried. "Elementary," said he.

拡張代入演算子.title: Augmented Assignment Operators

If式.title: If Expression

Else式.title: Else Expression

Else-If式.title: Else-If Expression

比較演算子.title: Comparison Operators
比較演算子.code:
var myAge = 19
var sisterAge = 11
var cousinAge = 11

myAge > sisterAge  // true
myAge < cousinAge  // false
myAge >= cousinAge // true
myAge <= sisterAge // false

論理演算子.title: Logical Operators

AND演算子: &&.title: AND Operator: &&

OR演算子: ||.title: OR Operator: ||

NOT演算子.title: NOT Operator
NOT演算子.code:
var hungry = true
var full = false

println(!hungry) // false
println(!full)   // true

評価順序.title: Evaluation Order
評価順序.code:
!true && (false || true) // false
/*
(false || true) is evaluated first to return true.
Then, evaluate !true && true and return the final result false
*/

!false && true || false // true
/*
!false is evaluated first to return true.
Then true && true is evaluated, returning true.
then, true || evaluates to false and eventually returns true
*/

ネストされた条件.title: Nested Conditionals

When式.title: When Expression

範囲演算子.title: Range Operator

等価演算子.title: Equality Operators
等価演算子.code:
var myAge = 22
var sisterAge = 21

myAge == sisterAge // false
myAge != sisterAge // true

リストへのアクセス.title: Accessing Lists
リストへのアクセス.code:
var cars = listOf("BMW", "Ferrari", "Volvo", "Tesla")

println(cars[2]) // Prints: Volvo

Size属性.title: Size Property
Size属性.code:
var worldContinents = listOf("Asia", "Africa", "North America", "South America", "Antarctica", "Europe", "Australia")

println(worldContinents.size) // Prints: 7

リスト操作.title: List Operations

可変セット.title: Mutable Set
可変セット.code: var womenInTech = mutableSetOf("Ada Lovelace", "Grace Hopper", "Radia Perlman", "Sister Mary Kenneth Keller")

コレクション要素へのアクセス.title: Accessing Collection Elements

不変マップ.title: Immutable Map
不変マップ.code: var averageTemp = mapOf("winter" to 35,  "spring" to 60,  "summer" to 85, "fall" to 55)

可変マップ.title: Mutable Map
可変マップ.code: var europeanDomains = mutableMapOf("Germany" to "de", "Slovakia" to "sk", "Hungary" to "hu", "Norway" to "no")

マップのキーと値の取得.title: Getting Map Keys and Values

マップエントリの追加と削除.title: Adding and Removing Map Entries
